issue.title: Treat competitions as resources with permissions

content.raw:
For SASC, we created resources for the competition on cloudsim-widgets' backend.

For SRC, we created resources for the competition on cloudsim-portal's backend.

Both approaches made use of identities registered with cloudsim-auth to organize users into "roles" that could access the competition resources.

I believe this issue has been addressed.
